description:
Aoi Sena is a third-year student at Suimei Academy. Takumi first encounters her in a hallway at school but quickly excuses himself after facing her ominous glare. She is often seen standing around Shibuya holding a very long sword and eating blue ice cream.
She seeks to kill her father, Issei Hatano, for sacrificing her mother and her younger sister for Noah II project, resulting in their death.
name: Aoi Sena
